comments.body: Side note: Is there a particular reason why we do not have a ledger API command for this? I keep assuming this exists until I remember it doesnâ€™t.
Wild guess: preventing contract information leakage do divulgees unless it was explicitly allowed by the model (as in this case)? @gerolf-da do you have something to share here?

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+-- Copyright (c) 2020 Digital Asset (Switzerland) GmbH and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+-- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
+
+module Divulgence where
+
+template Asset
+  with
+    owner: Party
+    tag: Text
+  where
+    signatory owner
+
+    nonconsuming choice Fetch: Asset
